subject: Drunken and Reckless Driving
lead_paragraph: Charles Barkley called his arrest for drunk driving “unacceptable” as he prepared to return to his television job after a six-week leave of absence. Barkley, 45, had a blood-alcohol level of .149 percent, nearly twice the legal limit of .08 percent in Arizona, after he was arrested Dec. 31 in Scottsdale. He will resume his role as a studio analyst for TNT on Thursday.
